clients.title: Our clients
clients.subtitle: More than 500 organizations trust SAWES for their water, sanitation and environment projects

testimonial1.name: UNICEF Burkina Faso
testimonial1.text: SAWES has been an invaluable partner in our water and sanitation programs, delivering exceptional results across multiple regions.

testimonial2.name: Agence Française de Développement
testimonial2.text: Their expertise in water infrastructure development and capacity building has significantly contributed to our development objectives.

testimonial3.name: African Development Bank
testimonial3.text: SAWES demonstrates remarkable professionalism and technical excellence in all their project implementations.

testimonial4.name: ECOWAS
testimonial4.text: Their regional expertise and innovative approaches have been crucial for our water resource management initiatives.

testimonial5.name: European Union
testimonial5.text: SAWES consistently delivers high-quality technical studies and project management services that exceed expectations.

testimonial6.name: ONEA
testimonial6.text: Their support in urban water service management has been instrumental in improving service delivery to our customers.

testimonial7.name: Government of Burkina Faso
testimonial7.text: SAWES has been a trusted partner in implementing national water and sanitation policies and programs.

testimonial8.name: CODEX
testimonial8.text: Their technical expertise and collaborative approach make them an excellent partner for complex infrastructure projects.

case1.title: Water Infrastructure Development
case1.description: Comprehensive water supply system development across multiple regions, including feasibility studies, design, and implementation support for sustainable water access.

case2.title: Sanitation Program Implementation
case2.description: Large-scale sanitation and hygiene promotion program in rural communities, featuring innovative approaches to behavior change and infrastructure development.

cta.title: Ready to improve water, sanitation and environment in your region?
cta.description: Partner with SAWES to develop sustainable solutions for water, sanitation, and environmental challenges. Our team of experts is ready to support your projects with innovative approaches and proven methodologies.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: We are always looking for new collaboration opportunities. Contact us to discuss your projects in water, sanitation and environment.
contact.message: Our team of experts is at your service to support you.

introduction.text: For over 25 years, SAWES has built strong partnerships with international organizations, bilateral agencies, governments, private sector and civil society. These strategic collaborations enable us to deliver high-impact projects that improve quality of life for communities across West Africa.

home.title: SAWES - Sahelian Agency for Water, Environment and Sanitation
home.description: SAWES, a company specialized in water, sanitation and environment in Burkina Faso since 2000. Expertise in planning, technical studies, training and urban service management.
